channel.title: iDigital

item.title: Supermarket giant Kroger’s downbeat profit view reflects factors ‘outside our control’
item.description: Kroger‘s fiscal 2025 projection falls short of analyst estimates as the latest big store chain to warn of headwinds.

item.title: Alibaba’s new open source model QwQ-32B matches DeepSeek-R1 with way smaller compute requirements
item.description: While DeepSeek-R1 operates with 671 billion parameters, QwQ-32B achieves comparable performance with a much smaller footprint.

item.title: Nvidia’s stock selloff deepens after Marvell earnings: ‘Boy, sentiment is rough.’
item.description: There’s a “crisis of confidence” on Wall Street when it comes to AI stocks, according to an analyst.

item.title: Macy’s stock falls as it cuts guidance in the face of ‘external uncertainties’
item.description: The retailer said it’s taking a “prudent” approach to its outlook as it warns of a profit shortfall.

item.title: How the A-MEM framework supports powerful long-context memory so LLMs can take on more complicated tasks
item.description: A-MEM uses embeddings and LLMs to create dynamic memory notes that automatically link to create complex knowledge structures.

item.title: Welevel raises $5.7M to revolutionize procedural game development
item.description: Indie game development studio Welevel today announced that it raised $5.7 million in funding to transform procedural game development.
